product_name: The North Face HyVent Hiker Hat
long_description: The North Face HyVent(TM) hiker hat is a rainy day essential for folks who love being outdoors no matter what the weather is like. Ripstop nylon is tear- and puncture-resistant yet lightweight; mesh lining wicks moisture to keep you cool and dry. HyVent(R) waterproof breathable laminate repels rain and allows moisture to escape; Durable Water Repellant finish sheds water like a duck. Brim can be turned up and secured with rip-and-stick tabs. Toggle adjustment at back of crown lets you personalize the fit; brushed sweatband enhances comfort. Adjustable chin strap keeps hat secure when the wind picks up.
short_description: The North Face HyVent(TM) hiker hat is a rainy day essential for folks who love being outdoors no matter what the weather is like.
